metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25586 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Binutils. A logic fail in thebfd_init_section_decompress_status function may lead to the use of anuninitialized variable that can cause a crash and local denial of service.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
